1 KW AM
ALTERNATE SCHEME
Provides most of the features shown in the floor plan
at the right and the perspective drawing below, but
adds a small lounge which can be used as sleeping
quarters when necessary.
Construction and materials are the same, except for
the following: WALLSâ€”Exterior walls are partly
stud, partly 8" brick. Outer surfaces of exterior stud
walls are waterproof plywood, the joints covered
with wood battens. Exterior masonry walls are
furred.
